info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 04 at 12:34PM CDT until April 04 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM CDT FOR EASTERN OGLE AND NORTHEASTERN LEE COUNTIES... At 1234 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Davis Junction to near Hillcrest to near Rochelle, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Rochelle, Byron, Davis Junction, Hillcrest, Stillman Valley, Ashton, Creston, Lindenwood, Monroe Center, Leaf River, Lee, Steward, Kings and Chana. Including the following interstates... I-39 between mile markers 89 and 114. I-88 between mile markers 66 and 82. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
